content: Bank Account Asked by Ryan ThamAsked on 30 Jun 2019Hi! Just found out about this app, was wondering how do you peeps under POSB/DBS keep track of the amount in your account? Since these banks aren’t synced with Seedly , is it too much of a hassle?1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Kenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 30 Jun 2019Hello Ryan! Good to have you onboard the Seedly app!Personally for me, I do it manually just updating the account balances for the DBS accounts.I have two savings accounts with DBS so i do it once a week to make sure its up to date.For my main spending account its with OCBC. So no issues there!2 comments2

Ryan Tham30 Jun 2019Yupp! I too have 2 dbs account and one OCBC (credit card), hmm thanks for that i Guess I’ll have to keep track constantly then (:Ryan Tham30 Jun 2019Thankyou! I too have 2 DBS and 1 OCBC account, will manually update the DBS ones then (:
